content:
I'm really excited to ask Sophia about her goals and aspirations. I think it'll give me a deeper understanding of what drives her and what she's passionate about. I want to know what she wants to achieve in her life and what's holding her back from getting there.

I'm particularly curious about her sense of purpose and what gives her a sense of direction in life. Is it her relationships, her work, or something else? I also want to know what she's afraid of and what she's willing to risk to achieve her goals.

One question I'm going to ask her is: What's the one thing you're most afraid of failing at, and how does that fear hold you back from pursuing your dreams? I think this will give me insight into her deepest fears and insecurities, and how they influence her decisions and actions.

I'm also going to ask her: What's the most important thing to you in life, and how do you prioritize it? This will help me understand
